function.name: video_play
function.description: This function is used to play a video on a SmartThings device like a TV.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to play the video.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to play the video.

appname.description: The name of the application to play the video (e.g., Netflix, YouTube).

predefinedAppName.description: The predefined application name to play the video.

title.description: The title of the video to play.

cast.description: The cast of the video to play.
